title: No. 3 Squadron World War 1
itunes:title: No. 3 Squadron World War 1
itunes:subtitle: A couple of incidents
description:
While researching for an upcoming episode, I came across a couple of incidents involving No. 3 Squadron in World War 1. I thought they were interesting so I'm sharing them in this bonus episode. Enjoy.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
